data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Whenever someone needs to find out how much space a particular file
    or directory is occupying, one finds himself resorting to the Unix
    command `du` or something similar.

    A module offering this functionality (which is one of the most
    basic ones of any filesystem: "to know how much thing X is
    occupying") should be registered.
